verses.roman:
tāla-patre śloka likhi' cālete rākhilā
samudra-snāna karibāre rūpa-gosāñi gelā

synonyms: tāla-patre—on a palm leaf; śloka—the verse; likhi'-writing; cālete—in the thatched roof; rākhilā—kept it; samudra-snāna—bath in the sea; karibāre-for taking; rūpa-gosāñi—of the name Rūpa Gosvāmī; gelā—departed.
translation: After writing this verse on a palm leaf, Rūpa Gosvāmī put it somewhere in his thatched roof and went to bathe in the sea.
